tool_description: Optimizes transfer routes between locations considering distance, capacity constraints, and operational requirements to minimize cost and transit time.

optimization_priority.description: Primary optimization goal: cost, time, or balanced

max_transit_days.description: Maximum acceptable transit time in days

vehicle_capacity_limit.description: Maximum vehicle weight capacity in kg

error_messages: Invalid optimization priority: Must be one of 'cost', 'time', or 'balanced'.
Route not found: No viable route exists between origin and one or more destinations.
Capacity constraint violated: Transfer requirements exceed vehicle_capacity_limit.
Transit time unrealistic: max_transit_days is too restrictive for the distance involved.
Location accessibility: One or more locations are not accessible for transfers.
usage: Specify origin_location_id and destination_location_ids array, then choose optimization_priority. Set max_transit_days and vehicle_capacity_limit based on operational constraints. Use 'balanced' priority for most scenarios.

total_distance_km.description: Total distance for all optimized routes

estimated_transit_time_hours.description: Estimated total transit time in hours

route_efficiency_score.description: Efficiency rating of the optimized routes (0-1)
